def turn(state):

    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_pair = all_close([x,y], ctx)
        check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)

        check_y_tiny = is_small(y, ctx)

            check_xy_pair
            and check_x_large
            and check_x_dark
            and check_y_above_left_x

def turn(state):

    for x, y, z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_line = is_line([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_medium = is_medium_size(x, ctx)
        check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_y_light_grey = is_lighter(y, x, ctx) and is_grey(y, ctx)
        check_z_smaller_x = is_smaller(z, x, ctx)
        check_z_below_x = is_below(z, x, ctx)

            check_xyz_line
            and check_x_medium
            and check_x_dark
            and check_y_light_grey
            and check_z_smaller_x
            and check_z_below_x

    return results
